text:

(playful music)
(girl gasps)
(kids laughing)
(hamster squeaking)

♪ How can I show you the
million ways I care ♪

♪ Oh, how can I share the way
I love, love, love, love you ♪

♪ Sometimes we say it with
glitter, paint, and glue ♪

♪ Sometimes we say it with
words and what we do ♪
♪ There's a lot of ways to show you ♪
♪ The million ways I love you ♪
(toddler laughing)

♪ There's a lot of ways to show you ♪
♪ The million ways I love you ♪

♪ How can I show you the

♪ Oh, how can I share the way

♪ There's a lot of ways to show you ♪
♪ The million ways I love you ♪
(kids laughing)

♪ How can I show you the

(family laughing)
